sources.title: Horsefly Opera (1941)
sources.description: Yet another of John Foster's bug cartoons, much like Fly Hi and Fly Frolic ten years earlier. Boy Bug loses girl bug to big spider that invades a fly night club. This time there's cowboy flies on horsefly mounts. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/horsefly-opera-1941/

metadata.Plot: Yet another of John Foster's bug cartoons, much like Fly Hi and Fly Frolic ten years earlier. Boy Bug loses girl bug to big spider that invades a fly night club. This time there's cowboy flies on horsefly mounts.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Isadore Klein, Donald McKee
